verses.verse: <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5025>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>, when the <S%G4129>number<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> was <S%G4129>multiplied<s%>, there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G1112>murmuring<s%> of the <S%G1675>Grecians<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> the <S%G1445>Hebrews<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5503>widows<s%> were <S%G3865>neglected<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2522>daily<s%> <S%G1248>ministration<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> the <S%G4128>multitude<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> unto them, and <S%G2036>said<s%>, It <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G701>reason<s%> that <S%G2248>we<s%> should <S%G2641>leave<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, and <S%G1247>serve<s%> <S%G5132>tables<s%>.

<S%G3767>Wherefore<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, look ye <S%G1980>out<s%> <S%G1537>among<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> of honest <S%G3140>report<s%>, <S%G4134>full<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> we may <S%G2525>appoint<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G5532>business<s%>.
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> will give ourselves <S%G4342>continually<s%> to <S%G4335>prayer<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> of the <S%G3056>word<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3056>saying<s%> <S%G700>pleased<s%> <S%G1799><s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1586>chose<s%> <S%G4736>Stephen<s%>, a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4402>Prochorus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3527>Nicanor<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5096>Timon<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3937>Parmenas<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3532>Nicolas<s%> a <S%G4339>proselyte<s%> of <S%G491>Antioch<s%>:

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> they <S%G2476>set<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> when they had <S%G4336>prayed<s%>, they <S%G2007>laid<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2007>on<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G837>increased<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4129>multiplied<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G4970>greatly<s%>; <S%G5037>and<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>company<s%> of the <S%G2409>priests<s%> were <S%G5219>obedient<s%> to the <S%G4102>faith<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> there <S%G450>arose<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> the synagogue of the <S%G3032>Libertines<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2956>Cyrenians<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G221>Alexandrians<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of them <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2791>Cilicia<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G773>Asia<s%>, <S%G4802>disputing<s%> with <S%G4736>Stephen<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G2480>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2480>able<s%> to <S%G436>resist<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> by <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G2980>spake<s%>.

<S%G5037>And<s%> they stirred <S%G4787>up<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> came <S%G2186>upon<s%> him, and <S%G4884>caught<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> him <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4892>council<s%>,

<S%G1063>For<s%> we have <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3480>Nazareth<s%> shall <S%G2647>destroy<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G236>change<s%> the <S%G1485>customs<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%>. customs: or, rites

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> that <S%G2516>sat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4892>council<s%>, looking <S%G816>stedfastly<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> as it had <S%G5616>been<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of an <S%G32>angel<s%>.
